name: Spooky Gothic Siege
description:
The Evil Gods have came, the dead have risen. All is lost.

Only one question remains - how long will it take?
The Last Tower stood tall, the remains of military have gathered.

There is no hope for survival - only for the final stand.

Instructions:

Press LMB to shoot your gun.

After buying an unit you have to place it on a battlefield.

Snipers are great at killing zombies, while machine gunners make their advance slower (making sniper's job easier).

Necromancers spawn randomly.
